content: the same place as shown on the chart below this way they don t start swirling ▲ ▲ ▲ exemplary chart on decreasing in reversile rib cap ▲= centered double decrease white square = st in pattern grey square has no meaning k 1 pass all sts over pull the yarn doubled and cut it so that you can sew it in sew in ends carefully and make them unnoticeable block and dry fold the edge as you please and wear the cap with either side out this pattern is for personal non-commercial use only not to be distributed commercially without a permission distantknitter blogspot com 2009
